Enter your vote today!  A new poll has been created for the 
nbwrpg group:

Do you think the arrival of many new (or
old) players and new characters will
have a boosting effect on this RPG? 

  o Ya betcha! 
  o A small one, I think... 
  o Talk to my lawyer. 
  o THEY ALL SUCK! IT WON'T CHANGE! 
  o Ah! Nothing better than a Fusionnaire by the beach! 


To vote, please visit the following web page:

http://groups.yahoo.com/group/nbwrpg/surveys?id=1041697  

Note: Please do not reply to this message. Poll votes are 
not collected via email. To vote, you must go to the Yahoo! Groups 
web site listed above.

Thanks!
